attributes.action: Make JSA pay more than Incapacity benefity or ESA
attributes.additional_details:
Too many people in Liverpool and Newcastle etc are on the sick. They know Incapacity pays more than JSA plus you don't have to sign on etc.

I propose making JSA pay more than Incapacity - checking people are really applying for jobs. If we did this and reduced Incapacity below JSA we would soon find out who was cheating the system before.
